external_references.source_name: IBM MUSTANG PANDA PUBLOAD CLAIMLOADER JUNE 2025
external_references.description: Golo Muhr, Joshua Chung. (2025, June 23). Hive0154 aka Mustang Panda shifts focus on Tibetan community to deploy Pubload backdoor. Retrieved August 4, 2025.
Raggi, M. et al. (2022, March 7). The Good, the Bad, and the Web Bug: TA416 Increases Operational Tempo Against European Governments as Conflict in Ukraine Escalates. Retrieved March 16, 2022.

objects.description: [Mustang Panda](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0129) has used DropBox URLs to deliver variants of [PlugX](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0013).(Citation: Proofpoint TA416 Europe March 2022) [Mustang Panda](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0129) has also used Google Drive to host malicious downloads.(Citation: IBM MUSTANG PANDA PUBLOAD CLAIMLOADER JUNE 2025)
